name: The Knight & Her Liege - Part 1
description:
Your caravan has been ambushed and your Lord is missing. As his last remaining knight, it now falls to you to track him down. But it will not be easy. Many dangers and problems to solve lie ahead of you. Do you have what is needed to return your Lord to safety? 

This is part one of a series of adventures that will take you across the land of Aleswyth in search of your liege. 

Follow me on Twitter to find out when the next update is released!
